summary: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Danny Denzongpa|Rana Daggubati|Taapsee Pannu|Anupam Kher|Kay Kay Menon|Sushant Singh|Madhurima Tuli|Mikaal Zulfiqar|Hasan Noman|Rasheed Naz|Kerem Sarikaya|Zachary Coffin|Karan Aanand|Nabeel Ahmed|Kiran Anand|Ali Balkan Avci|Sandeep Bharadwaj|Sajjad Delafrooz|Anupam Gahoi|Syed Ahad Hussain|Onur Can Karatas|Dishita Sehgal|Murli Sharma|Sanjeev Tyagi|Jaywant Wadkar
keywords: terrorist|die hard scenario|indo pak|espionage|behind enemy lines
title: Baby
